channel.title: cajun – Chow Down Orlando
channel.description: Exploring all that Orlando has to offer.

item.title: Dixieland Diner
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:
This is the pecan crusted catfish served on a bed of sweet potato cheese grits from the Dixieland Diner food truck. While the picture is very orange, the food was delicious. The breading on the fish was very light but crispy and the sweet potato in the cheese grits were a very nice touch. You […]

The post Dixieland Diner appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
This is the pecan crusted catfish served on a bed of sweet potato cheese grits from the Dixieland Diner food truck. While the picture is very orange, the food was delicious. The breading on the fish was very light but crispy and the sweet potato in the cheese grits were a very nice touch.

You can find Dixieland Diner on Twitter.

The post Dixieland Diner appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.

item.title: Belle Isle Bayou
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:
The Belle Isle Bayou is a new cajun restaurant at the corner of Conway and Hoffner and it is delicious. All of the food seems fresh and slightly different takes on bayou favorites. Pictured at top is the jambalaya pasta. It’s your typical jambalaya with sausage, chicken, peppers, etc, but instead of being mixed with brown rice, […]

The post Belle Isle Bayou appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
The Belle Isle Bayou is a new cajun restaurant at the corner of Conway and Hoffner and it is delicious. All of the food seems fresh and slightly different takes on bayou favorites.

Pictured at top is the jambalaya pasta. It’s your typical jambalaya with sausage, chicken, peppers, etc, but instead of being mixed with brown rice, it’s mixed with penne pasta and a white cream sauce. It’s killer.

Also pictured are shrimp and grits, which are cheesy and wonderful; fried pickles which are thick cut, crispy, and great; and a different take on a caesar salad that includes tomatoes and lettuce that has sat for just a second on the wood grill to produce sear marks and a nice smokey flavor.

If you’re looking for a new place to try, and you’re in the mood for some fresh cajun fare, give Belle Isle Bayou a try. You’ll be glad you did.

The post Belle Isle Bayou appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.

item.title: Louie’s Bistro
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:
What you see here is one of the more unique food truck menu items in town. It comes from Louie’s Bistro and is a heaping portion of crawfish étouffée. I’ll admit, I had to ask what étouffée is when I saw it on the menu. I’m glad I did because there were a lot of tempting […]

The post Louie’s Bistro appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
What you see here is one of the more unique food truck menu items in town. It comes from Louie’s Bistro and is a heaping portion of crawfish étouffée.

I’ll admit, I had to ask what étouffée is when I saw it on the menu. I’m glad I did because there were a lot of tempting things listed on the board, but once étouffée was described as “a brown rue made with the trinity” I knew I was in. It’s delicious. Mixed with the rice and with the addition of the crawfish and fried okra for a nice texture change, the whole meal is wonderful.

Not only is the Crawfish Étouffée one of the most interesting food truck options in town, it’s also one of the best values. It’s a surprising portion of food that comes with a drink. Louie’s Bistro is a serious contender among the food trucks here in town and worth your visit.

You can find Louie’s Bistro on Twitter.

The post Louie’s Bistro appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
